org.elasticsearch.percolator

Class PercolateRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequestBuilder<PercolateRequest,PercolateResponse,PercolateRequestBuilder>
      • org.elasticsearch.percolator.PercolateRequestBuilder
  • Deprecated. 
    Instead use search API with PercolateQueryBuilder

    @Deprecated
public class PercolateRequestBuilder
extends org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequestBuilder<PercolateRequest,PercolateResponse,PercolateRequestBuilder>
    A builder the easy to use of defining a percolate request.

      • setDocumentType

        public PercolateRequestBuilder setDocumentType(java.lang.String type)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the type of the document to percolate. This is important as it selects the mapping to be used to parse the document.

      • setRouting

        public PercolateRequestBuilder setRouting(java.lang.String routing)
        Deprecated. 
        A comma separated list of routing values to control the shards the search will be executed on.

      • setRouting

        public PercolateRequestBuilder setRouting(java.lang.String... routings)
        Deprecated. 
        List of routing values to control the shards the search will be executed on.

      • setPreference

        public PercolateRequestBuilder setPreference(java.lang.String preference)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the preference to execute the search. Defaults to randomize across shards. Can be set to _local to prefer local shards, _primary to execute only on primary shards, or a custom value, which guarantees that the same order will be used across different requests.

      • setGetRequest

        public PercolateRequestBuilder setGetRequest(org.elasticsearch.action.get.GetRequest getRequest)
        Deprecated. 
        Enables percolating an existing document. Instead of specifying the source of the document to percolate, define a get request that will fetch a document and use its source.

      • setOnlyCount

        public PercolateRequestBuilder setOnlyCount(boolean onlyCount)
        Deprecated. 
        Whether only to return total count and don't keep track of the matches (Count percolation).
